Description: On I-66 at mile marker 52.9 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 232.8 in the County of Augusta, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 3.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On Rt. 643 East in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of Belmont Rd; Turner Rd; Rt. 651E/W (Chesterfield County); Rt. 650N/S (Chesterfield County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Weather Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 119.5 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-264 at mile marker 14.3 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Newtown Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
